Core REST API¶

class hpsdnclient.core.CoreMixin(controller, auth)¶

Flare REST API Core Methods. i.e, those in sdn/v2.0/

delete_app(app)¶

Undeploy and application

delete_auth(token)¶

Delete Authentication Token, AKA, Logout. This method logs out the owner of the supplied token.

delete_config_component(component)¶

Revert a configuration to default

deploy_app(app)¶

Deploy an app

get_app_health(app)¶

Get app health information

get_app_info(app)¶

Get application information

get_apps()¶

Get a list of applications

get_auth(user, password)¶

Get Authentication Token. This method returns a dictionary with the token and expiration time

get_configs()¶

Get a list of configuration paramters

get_install_id()¶

Get install id

get_licence_detail(serial_no)¶

Get a license by serial number

get_licenses(key=None)¶

List all licenses

get_support(artifact=None, fields=None)¶

Get a full support report

monitor_app_health(app)¶

Monitor app health

post_app_action(app, action)¶

Perform an action on a deployed application

post_licence_action(serial_no, action)¶

Perfom an action on the license

post_licences(key)¶

Add a new license
